page.title: 09MILL HILL BROADWAY
page.content: {Mill Hill Broadway}is a fairly busy shopping centre.There is one big supermarket,several travel agencies, all four main banks are represented and many Estate agencies.There are some nurseries that sell flowers and plants ,hairdressing salons,a model shop and hardware stores.There are electrical shops,a wine bar,and at least 5 eating places.Three churches represent the Angelican, Catholic and United Reform religions,and there is a synagogue in an adjacent street. There is a busy bus station situated below the arches of the M.1. motorway. There is a British rail station that is used by the local service from St. Pancras to Bedford.The motorway runs parallel to the railway tracks.The local fire station,library and clinic are just off the main road.There is a British Legion club and 3 garages.
